org.linqs.psl.application.learning.weight.maxlikelihood

Class MaxLikelihoodMPE

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • org.linqs.psl.application.learning.weight.WeightLearningApplication
        • org.linqs.psl.application.learning.weight.maxlikelihood.VotedPerceptron
          • org.linqs.psl.application.learning.weight.maxlikelihood.MaxLikelihoodMPE
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ModelApplication

    public class MaxLikelihoodMPE
extends VotedPerceptron
    Learns weights by optimizing the log likelihood of the data using the voted perceptron algorithm.

    The expected total incompatibility is estimated with the total incompatibility in the MPE state.

    Author:
    Stephen Bach
